channel.title: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:
channel.description:
i want to make player owned houses at my server but how i can do this? I want to make a code like this: ::house <playername> People need to make the room by herself.
P.S. im from the Netherlands

item.title: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

I did them exactly the same as a 508 does >.>

Maybe the 317 client just isn’t designed for construction…

Read full topic
item.source: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:

item.title: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Every source that you can find atm ^

And yes I did have full construction working. And it lagged due to the client receiving too many packets at once due to the object loading.

Read full topic
item.source: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:

item.title: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

I had built full construction in a 317 before by making it so everyone had an individual house on a individual 4 * houseREGISTERID (given when they bought the house) and yeah. I suggest never to do construction in a 317. IT WAS LAGGY AS SHIT. I had a 4 story house and it didn’t go too well. It lagged for like 3 seconds when I changed floors and I even revised the makeglobalobject method to load faster, made all the objects load from mysql, everything. Its terrible.

Get a 508, every 508 has it working

Read full topic
item.source: Player owned houses? How i make? :confused:
